name: Whiz Kid: Marble Champions
description:
Whiz Kid : Marble Champions

Submission for the Godot Wild Jam of June 2022.

Tired of deck building? Have you tried bag building? WK:Marble Champions is a playground-themed roguelite where you play as Whiz Kid, a fan or marble duels. In his mind, he's playing with magic orbs, but who are we to judge?

Score points by launching your marbles into the targets and defeat the reigning champion!

Note : Please play with hardware acceleration !

Basic Controls World Map

Click on a spot on the next level to move on to a connected node.

You can click your marbles in the bottom-right bag to see their stats!

Battle

Click a marble in your bag on the right to select it.

Click and drag on your launching area to throw your marble!
